price: Hwε sεdeε wͻ’si bͻ wͻn tirim twa nkontompo to Nyankopͻn soͻ. Woi yε bͻne a εsom bo na εda adi pefee.
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَۖ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦٓ إِثۡمٗا مُّبِينًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba wakafā bihi ith'man mubīnan
